mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.province_name AS "provinceName", a.province_code AS "provinceCode", a.province_desc AS "provinceDesc", a.area_id AS "area.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a5.name AS "area.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_area a5 ON a5.id = a.area_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM auto_province a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.province_name LIKE '%'||#{provinceName}||'%' '%'+#{provinceName}+'%' concat('%',#{provinceName},'%')
AND a.province_desc LIKE '%'||#{provinceDesc}||'%' '%'+#{provinceDesc}+'%' concat('%',#{provinceDesc},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auto_province( province_name, province_code, province_desc, area_id, remarks, create_by, create_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{provinceName}, #{provinceCode}, #{provinceDesc}, #{area.id}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE auto_province SET province_name = #{provinceName}, province_code = #{provinceCode}, province_desc = #{provinceDesc}, area_id = #{area.id}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
